nodes.text: Scurto Tobbs was a human male criminal who was serving a 45-year sentence in the Karthon Chop Fields, for transport of class 4 contraband. His profile in the New Republic prison registry was one of several that Marshal Carasynthia Dune looked at from her office on the planet Nevarro in around 9 ABY while searching for the profile of prisoner Migs Mayfeld.
Scurto Tobb's profile first appeared in "Chapter 14: The Tragedy", the sixth episode of the second season of The Mandalorian, which was released on December 4, 2020.
